comment: Membership in an initial segment. The idiom ` ( ``' A " { B } ) ` , meaning ` { x | x A B } ` , is used to specify an initial segment in (for example) Definition 6.21 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
